name: The Potionist Apprentice
description:
STORY

In a little village of a fantasy world, a potionist apprentice has been abandoned by its master, who left the instructions to attend to The Villagers' request's in a dream. The problem is that The Master thinks himself a poet, writing down illegible recipes, making life difficult for The Apprentice. 

FEATURES

  • Gather items from around The Village.
  • Revise The Master's annotations to solve the recipes.
  • Brew the recipes in the cauldron (Make sure the steps are in order).
  • Check the quest board to know what the villagers have requested.
  • Deliver the requested items into the villagers' mailbox.
  • Sleep the fatigue off and start a new day.

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • X - Interact
  • Esc - Open Menu
